name: Nwa Nkita
description:
Help your puppy to reach the top floor of the temple. You can walk, run, jump, climb, carry object, push object, push lever etc ... and give order to the puppy. This is just the 1st level, maybe more levels in the futur. 

2 languages : English / Français

Gamepad / Keyboard

The character and its animations are recovered from mixamo and have been retouched.
The puppy and his animations were made by myself via blender.
3D assets have been retrieved from the internet, are free and free to use.
Assets modular temple: https://www.fertilesoilproductions.com

Music by Nicolas Gasparini (Myuu): http://www.thedarkpiano.com/
